subject: Thank you for your recent application, we are accepting your refinance appication
body:
Your your credit report doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this offer will expire THIS NIGHT):
$443,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this easy form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://luvuiiksheap.com/
